author: maymay07
title: My Bakery.
review:
Box/Instructions

It's a rectangle with some pretty papers. :-)

Parts

Some rare pieces are the key, the baker's hair, and the dough. I like the croissant and I think that the key is pretty cute, and I really like the cupcake top. I also like the Chocolate chip cookie.

Minifigures

The minifigures are Azari and Johnny baker.

The build

It's very fun and took about 45 minutes to complete. And, (If it's possible to have more,) is pretty easy to work with. 

The completed model

It is really cool and I like to play with it a lot. It looks like a real bakery; it is kind of leafy for a bakery though.

Overall opinion

It's very fun to play with. You should match it with the Treetop Hideaway (41075).

author: Azure_sea
title: One of best sets of the line
review:
Being a set that includes one of the elemental keys I knew I had to buy it, Although all of the elemental key sets are very original and good this is the worst of the five which isn't bad because it's just the others are so much better.

The features are very good, my six year old cousin loved this set because of the way the key was hidden so well. The bread oven really did add a lot more life to the bakery.

Overall, all good set maybe I would have preferred it if it includes one more animal companion or mini doll.
